name: BMX
description: BMX (bicycle motocross) bikes are designed for stunts, tricks, and racing on dirt BMX tracks.

name: Electric
description: An electric bicycle is a bicycle with an integrated electric motor for propulsion.

name: Fitness
description: Fitness bikes combine road bike speed and upright comfort for aggressive fitness rides or long commutes.

name: Foldable
description: A folding bicycle is a bicycle designed to fold into a compact form, facilitating transport and storage.

name: Kids
description: Kids bicycles are designed for kids with reduced size.

name: Mountain
description: Mountain bicycles (a.k.a. All Terrain Bicycle) are designed for off-road cycling.

name: Road
description: Road bicycles are designed for traveling at speed on paved roads.

name: Tandem
description: A tandem or twin has two or more riders behind each other.

name: Touring
description: A touring bicycle is a bicycle designed or modified to handle bicycle touring.

name: Triathlon
description: Triathlon bikes are built to meet the demands of professional triathletes and world champion time trialists

name: Unicycle
description: A unicycle is a vehicle that touches the ground with only one wheel.

name: Utility
description: Utility bicycles are designed for commuting, shopping and running errands.
